title: Effects of the Second Great Awakening

content.question: Directions: You are advised to spend 5 minutes planning and 30 minutes writing your answer. Cite relevant historical evidence in support of your generalizations and present your arguments clearly and logically. In what ways did the Second Great Awakening in the North influence TWO of the following?AbolitionismTemperanceThe cult of domesticity Utopian communities

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
